overview_of_class: We will develop fundamental concepts of probability and statistical theory, with applications. Topics include sample spaces, probability measures, conditional probability, independence, random variables, distributions, expected values, variance, and limit theory. The sequels (320-2,3) emphasize statistical inference.
name: Statistical Methods
title: WCAS STAT 320-1-20 Statistical Methods
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration is reserved for Statistics Majors and Minors only.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: We will develop fundamental concepts of probability and statistical theory, with applications. Topics include sample spaces, probability measures, conditional probability, independence, random variables, distributions, expected values, variance, and limit theory. The sequels (320-2,3) emphasize statistical inference.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Calculus at the level of Math 234 (Multiple Integration) and a prior statistics course.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
ISBN-13: 9780534399429;
Mathematical Statistics and Data Analysis (3rd Edition);
John A Rice;
Duxbury Press India
